name: Broadsword Past/Future Sigil
description: Display the faces of leadership with this sigil.

languages.description: Zeige die Gesichter der Führung mit diesem Siegel.
languages.name: Siegel: Broadsword Vergangenheit/Zukunft

languages.description: Affichez les visages incarnant le leadership avec ce Sceau.
languages.name: Sceau Broadsword passé/futur

languages.description: Mostra i volti della leadership con questo sigillo.
languages.name: Sigillo Broadsword Passato/Futuro

languages.description: 이 시질로 지도자의 면모를 표현해 보세요.
languages.name: 브로드소드 패스트/퓨처 시질

languages.description: Muestra los rostros del liderazgo con este sello.
languages.name: Sello Broadsword del pasado/futuro

languages.description: 用这款纹章来展现领导者的风采。
languages.name: 宽剑今昔纹章

languages.description: Продемонстрируйте лидерство с помощью этого сигила.
languages.name: Сигил: Бродсворд - прошлое и будущее

languages.description: リーダーの風格を描いたシジル。
languages.name: 過去と未来のBroadsword シジル

languages.description: Exiba os rostos da liderança com este brasão.
languages.name: Brasão: Espada do Passado ou Futuro

languages.description: 透過這個浮印來展現老大的樣貌。
languages.name: 寶劍昔今紋章

languages.description: เครื่องหมายที่แสดงให้เห็นถึงใบหน้าของผู้นำ
languages.name: เครื่องหมาย: Broadsword ในอดีตและอนาคต
